1.4.5.name: wordpress/heatmap-adaptive
1.4.5.description: I am a responsive theme for WordPress inspired by Google Adsense placement recommendations (you can use other types of ads with me too). There's a widget position map in my options page so you can see where everything goes. Upgrade to HeatMap AdAptive Pro Membership for priority support from the Developer, extra features and the awesome Click Missile ads plugin.
